publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8075 Pauline McNeill: Back the Modernisation of the Glasgow Subway System—That the Parliament supports the Strathclyde Partnership for Transport plan for modernisation of the Glasgow subway system; warmly welcomes the planned improvements to Hillhead Station and what it considers the imaginative plans for the environment of the underground station; believes that modernisation should include the extension of opening hours and improved frequencies, and calls on the Scottish Government to back the business case without delay.
S3M-8075 Back the Modernisation of the Glasgow Subway System (lodged on 4 March 2011) Ms Wendy Alexander*

S3M-8075 Pauline McNeill: Back the Modernisation of the Glasgow Subway System—That the Parliament supports the Strathclyde Partnership for Transport plan for modernisation of the Glasgow subway system; warmly welcomes the planned improvements to Hillhead Station and what it considers the imaginative plans for the environment of the underground station; believes that modernisation should include the extension of opening hours and improved frequencies, and calls on the Scottish Government to back the business case without delay. Supported by: Ms Wendy Alexander
